item.title: 2x2 Ethernet Takes on T-1
item.description:
For the past decade, small and medium businesses have relied on T1 lines as their primary commercial telecom solution. However, a new competitor called 2x2 Ethernet, recently introduced by major nationwide carrier MegaPath, is emerging to challenge the long-standing T1. Let’s explore what 2x2 Ethernet offers. It might seem surprising that T1 lines would face competition, considering their 50-year history and widespread adoption. As the first widely available broadband digital connection for businesses, T1 emerged from telephone company research...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/2x2-ethernet-takes-on-t-1/
